client.server

Class ServerProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.server.ServerProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServerProxy

    public class ServerProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServerProxy
    Communicates with the server API. Keeps track of player and game cookies. Created by Xander on 9/12/2016.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerProxy()
      Default constructor, sets all values to new objects.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerProxy

        public ServerProxy()
        Default constructor, sets all values to new objects. Also sets host, port, and base URL for the communicator class.

    • Method Detail

      • setPlayer

        public void setPlayer(int playerID)
        Instructs the server communicator which player's turn it is. The communicator uses the player's specific cookie.
        Specified by:
        setPlayer in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        playerID - ID to give to the player

      • userLogin

        public void userLogin(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password)
        Logs the caller into the server and sets their catan.user HTTP cookie.
        Specified by:
        userLogin in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the player logging in.
        password - Password that corresponds to the username of player logging in.
        Precondition:
                username is not null
        password is not null
        Postcondition:
         If username/ password is valid:
                1. Server returns an HTTP 200 response message
                2. HTTP response headers set catan.cookie to contain identity of the logged in player.

 If username/ password is not valid:
        1. Server returns 400 error response and body contains an error message.

      • gamesList

        public void gamesList()
        Returns information about all of the current games on the server.
        Specified by:
        gamesList in interface IServerProxy
        Postcondition:
                If the operation succeeds:
                1. Server returns an HTTP 200 reponse message
                2. The body contains a JSON array with a list of objects that contain info about the server's games.

        If the operation fails:
                1. Server returns 400 error response and body contains an error message.

      • gamesCreate

        public void gamesCreate(java.lang.String name,
                        boolean randomTiles,
                        boolean randomNumbers,
                        boolean randomPorts)
        Creates a new game on the server.
        Specified by:
        gamesCreate in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the game
        randomTiles - true if the tiles should be randomized, false if they should be preset
        randomNumbers - true if the numbers should be randomized, false if they should be preset
        randomPorts - true if the ports should be randomized, false if they should be preset
        Precondition:
                        1. name is not null
                2. randomTiles, randomNumbers, randomPorts contain valid boolean values
        Postcondition:
         If the operation succeeds:
                1. The server returns an HTTP 200 response message
                2. The body contains a JSON object describing the newly created game

 If the operation fails:
                1. Server returns 400 error response and body contains an error message.

      • gamesJoin

        public void gamesJoin(int gameID,
                      shared.definitions.CatanColor color)
        Adds the player to the specified game and sets their catan.game cookie.
        Specified by:
        gamesJoin in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        gameID - ID of the game to join
        color - Player color
        Precondition:
                1. The user has previously logged into the server (they have a valid catan.user HTTP cookie)
        2. The player may join the game because
                a. They are already in the game -OR-
                b. There is space in the game to add a new player
        3. The specified game is valid
        4. The specified color is valid
        Postcondition:
                If the operation succeeds:
                1. The server returns an HTTP 200 success response
                2. The player is in the game with the specified color
                3. The server response includes the "set-cookie" response header setting the catan.game HTTP cookie

        If the operation fails:
                1. Server returns 400 error response and body contains an error message.

      • gameGetModel

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject gameGetModel()
        Returns the current state of the game in JSON format.
        Specified by:
        gameGetModel in interface IServerProxy
        Precondition:
                1. The caller has previously logged into the server and joined a game (they have valid catan.game and catan.user HTTP cookies)
        Postcondition:
                If the operation succeeds:
                1. Server returns HTTP 200 response message
                2. The response body contains the full client model JSON

  If the operation fails:
                1. The server returns an HTTP 400 error message and the response body contains an error message

      • gameGetModel

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject gameGetModel(int version)
        Returns the current state of the game in JSON format.
        Specified by:
        gameGetModel in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        version - The version number of the model. Used to compare and check if model has been updated.
        Precondition:
                1. The caller has previously logged into the server and joined a game (they have valid catan.game and catan.user HTTP cookies)
        2. If specified, the version number is included as the "version" query parameter in the request URL,
                and its value is a valid integer.
        Postcondition:
                If the operation succeeds:
                 1. Server returns HTTP 200 response message
                 2. The response body contains JSON data
                        a. The full client model JSON is returned if the client does not provide a client number,
                                or the provided version number does not match the version on the server
                        b. "true" is returned if the caller provided a version number and it matched the version number on the server

  If the operation fails:
         1. The server returns an HTTP 400 error message and the response body contains an error message

      • gameListAI

        public void gameListAI()
        Returns a list of supported AI player types.
        Specified by:
        gameListAI in interface IServerProxy
        Precondition:
         If the operation succeeds
                 1. The server returns an HTTP 200 response message
                 2. The body contains a JSON string array enumerating the different types of AI players.
                   These are values that may be passed to the gameAddAI method

  If the operation fails:
                 1. The server returns an HTTP 400 error message and the response body contains an error message

      • gameAddAI

        public void gameAddAI(java.lang.String aiType)
        Adds an AI player to the current game.
        Specified by:
        gameAddAI in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        aiType - The AI player to add to the game
        Precondition:
         The caller has previously logged in to the server and joined a game (they have valid catan.user and catan.game HTTP cookies).
 There is space in the game for another player (the game is not �full�).
 The specified �AIType� is valid (one of the values returned by the /game/listAI method).
        Postcondition:
         If the operation succeeds:
                1. The server returns an HTTP 200 success response with �Success� in the body.
                2. A new AI player of the specified type has been added to the current game.
                        The server selected a name and color for the player.

 If the operation fails:
                1. The server returns an HTTP 400 error response, and the body contains an error message.

      • sendChat

        Sends a chat message to the group.
        Specified by:
        sendChat in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        content - The message to send
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
        Postcondition:
        the chat box contains the sent message

      • acceptTrade

        public void acceptTrade(boolean willAccept)
        A domestic trade is being offered. If the trade is accepted, the two players will swap the specified resources. If the trade is not accepted, no resources are exchanged and the trade offer is removed.
        Specified by:
        acceptTrade in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        willAccept - Whether or not the player accepts the offered trade
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                You have been offered a tag
                You have the required resources to accept the tag
        Postcondition:
                        If you accepted, you swap resources with the offering player
                If you declined, no resources are swapped
                The trade offer is removed

      • discardCards

        public void discardCards(java.lang.Object hand)
        Specified by:
        discardCards in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        hand - The cards being discarded
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                The status of the client model is 'Discarding'
                You have more than 7 cards
                You have the resources you are discarding
        TODO: Replace Object with correct class

      • rollNumber

        public void rollNumber(int number)
        Tell the server that the dice were rolled.
        Specified by:
        rollNumber in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        number - the number that was rolled, in the range 2-12
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                It is your turn
                The status of the client model is 'Rolling'

      • buildRoad

        public void buildRoad(boolean isFree,
                      shared.locations.EdgeLocation roadLocation)
        Specified by:
        buildRoad in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        isFree - during the setup phase, roads are free
        roadLocation - the new road's location.
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                It is your turn
                The status of the client model is 'Playing'
                The road location is open
                The road location is connected to your road
                The road location is not on water
                You have the required resources
                During setup, must be placed by settlement without adjacent road.
        Postcondition:
                        You have spent the required resources
                The road is at the location on the map
                Longest road has been awarded, if applicable

      • buildSettlement

        public void buildSettlement(boolean isFree,
                            shared.locations.VertexLocation vertexLocation)
        Specified by:
        buildSettlement in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        isFree - during the setup phase, settlements are free
        vertexLocation - the new settlement location
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                It is your turn
                The status of the client model is 'Playing'
                The settlement location is open
                The settlement location is connected to your road, except during setup
                The settlement location is not on water
                You have the required resources
        Postcondition:
                        You have spent the required resources
                The settlement is at the location on the map

      • buildCity

        public void buildCity(shared.locations.VertexLocation vertexLocation)
        Specified by:
        buildCity in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        vertexLocation - the new city's location
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                It is your turn
                The status of the client model is 'Playing'
                There is a settlement at the city location
                You have the required resources
        Postcondition:
                        You have spent the required resources
                The settlement is at the location on the map
                You regain 1 settlement

      • offerTrade

        public void offerTrade(java.lang.Object offer,
                       int receiverIndex)
        Contact another player and offer to trade cards back and forth.
        Specified by:
        offerTrade in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        offer - Cards you are offering - negative numbers means you receive those cards, positive means you give
        receiverIndex - The index of the recipient of the trade offer
        Precondition:
        You have the resources you are offering
        Postcondition:
        The trade is offered to the other player

      • maritimeTrade

        public void maritimeTrade(int ratio,
                          shared.definitions.ResourceType inputResource,
                          shared.definitions.ResourceType outputResource)
        Used when built on a port, or when trading to the bank.
        Specified by:
        maritimeTrade in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        ratio - 4 (to 1, when not on a port), 3 (to 1, when on a general port), 2 (to 1, when on a resource port)
        inputResource - What is given
        outputResource - What is received
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                You have the required resources
                If ratio is less than 4, you are built on the correct port
        Postcondition:
                        The offered resources are in the bank
                You have the requested resource.

      • robPlayer

        public void robPlayer(shared.locations.HexLocation location,
                      int victimIndex)
        Called when a 7 is rolled and the robber is being moved.
        Specified by:
        robPlayer in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        location - the new robber location
        victimIndex - the index of the player being robbed, or -1 if no one is being robbed
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                The robber is not being kept in the same spot.
                The player being robbed has resource cards.
        Postcondition:
                        The robber is in the new location
                The player being robbed gave you a random resource card.

      • finishTurn

        public void finishTurn()
        Called at the end of a player's turn.
        Specified by:
        finishTurn in interface IServerProxy
        Postcondition:
                        The cards in your new dev card hand have been moved to your old dev card hand.
                It is the next player's turn.

      • buyDevCard

        public void buyDevCard()
        Purchase a development card for 1 wheat, 1 sheep, and 1 ore.
        Specified by:
        buyDevCard in interface IServerProxy
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                You have the required resources
                There are dev cards left to buy
        Postcondition:
              You have a new dev card
                Monument cards are available immediately (in your old dev card hand)
                Other dev cards are unplayable this turn (in your new dev card hand)
                You have spent the required resources

      • playSoldier

        public void playSoldier(shared.locations.HexLocation location,
                        int victimIndex)
        Play a soldier/knight dev card. Analogous to moving the robber.
        Specified by:
        playSoldier in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        location - The location to move the robber to.
        victimIndex - The player to rob, or -1 if there are none.
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                It is your turn.
                The status of the client model is 'Playing'
                You have a soldier card in your old dev card hand
                You have not yet played a non-monument dev card this turn
                The robber is not being kept in the same location
                The player being robbed has resource cards
        Postcondition:
                        The robber has been moved to the new location
                The player being robbed gave you a random resource card
                Largest army has been awarded, if applicable
                You are not allowed to play non-monument dev cards

      • playYearOfPlenty

        public void playYearOfPlenty(shared.definitions.ResourceType resource1,
                             shared.definitions.ResourceType resource2)
        Play a Year of Plenty card, and receive 2 free resources.
        Specified by:
        playYearOfPlenty in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        resource1 - The first resource you want to receive
        resource2 - The second resource you want to receive
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                It is your turn.
                The status of the client model is 'Playing'
                You have a Year of Plenty card in your old dev card hand
                You have not yet played a non-monument dev card this turn
                The requested resources are in the bank.
        Postcondition:
        You have the requested resources and the bank does not.

      • playRoadBuilding

        public void playRoadBuilding(shared.locations.EdgeLocation location1,
                             shared.locations.EdgeLocation location2)
        Play a Road Building card, and build 2 roads.
        Specified by:
        playRoadBuilding in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        location1 - The first location to build a road
        location2 - The second location to build a road
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                It is your turn.
                The status of the client model is 'Playing'
                You have a Road Building card in your old dev card hand
                You have not yet played a non-monument dev card this turn
                The first road location is connected to one of your roads
                The second road location is connected to one of your roads, or to the first road
                Neither road location is on water
                You have 2+ unused roads.
        Postcondition:
                        You have 2 fewer unused roads.
                2 new roads are placed on the map.
                Longest road is awarded, if applicable.

      • playMonopoly

        public void playMonopoly(shared.definitions.ResourceType resource)
        Play a Monopoly card, and collect a specific resource from all other players.
        Specified by:
        playMonopoly in interface IServerProxy
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource being taken from the other players
        Precondition:
              Player is logged in
                Player has joined a game
                It is your turn.
                The status of the client model is 'Playing'
                You have a Monopoly card in your old dev card hand
                You have not yet played a non-monument dev card this turn
        Postcondition:
        All the players have given you all of their resources of the specified type

      • playVictoryPoint

        public void playVictoryPoint()
        Play a Monument card, and be awarded a victory point.
        Specified by:
        playVictoryPoint in interface IServerProxy
        Precondition:
        You have enough monument cards to reach 10 pts and win the game.
        Postcondition:
        You gained a victory point.
